events.message: We have received the application from the candidate who is interested in the software engineer position.
The application has been categorised under the engineering cluster based on the candidate's experience in software development.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to manage the candidate’s progress through the engineering recruitment process.
The initial screening went well with the candidate demonstrating strong knowledge of software engineering principles.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm about moving forward with the technical interview.
The technical interview has been scheduled for next week with the engineering team to assess coding skills and problem-solving.
The candidate completed the technical interview successfully, showing excellent programming and system design capabilities.
An HR interview has been arranged to discuss the candidate’s cultural fit, benefits, and compensation expectations.
The HR interview was positive, with the candidate showing alignment to company values and eagerness to join.
An offer for the software engineer role has been proposed to the candidate based on their strong performance and fit.
The candidate provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed excitement about the opportunity.
The candidate officially accepted the offer to join as a software engineer, confirming their start date.
The onboarding process has started for the new software engineer, including system access and orientation sessions.
The recruitment case is now closed with the successful hiring and onboarding of the software engineer.
